Property.name: raw_analog
Property.HelpText:
Use the raw analog values directly from the controller rather than the emulated Dreamcast controller where possible. For the analog sticks, this allows for significantly more analog resolution (+65000x) over vanilla.
Some mods modify the emulated Dreamcast controller values to perform certain effects, like flipping the controls. Turning this setting off will allow such effects to work correctly.

Property.name: analog
Property.HelpText: Restore analog-trigger camera movement from the GameCube version, and add analog camera movement with the right analog stick.

Property.name: inv_x2
Property.HelpText:
Invert left/right camera movement with the right analog stick compared to vanilla.
NOTE: Requres 'Analog Controls'

Property.name: inv_y2
Property.HelpText:
Invert up/down camera movement with the right analog stick.
NOTE: Currently not used by Input Controls, but other mods may read it

Property.name: inv_lr
Property.HelpText:
Invert left/right camera movement with the triggers compared to vanilla.
NOTE: Requres 'Analog Controls'

Property.name: gp_nb
Property.HelpText: Which Gamepad this player will read from.

Property.name: kb_nb
Property.HelpText: Which Keyboard layout this player will read from.

Property.name: lr_on
Property.HelpText:
Analog threshold of L/R on the emulated Dreamcast controller (0~255) for it to start registering as a digital press.
Dreamcast used a value of 192. PC used a value of 140.

Property.name: lr_off
Property.HelpText:
Analog threshold of L/R on the emulated Dreamcast controller (0~255) for it to stop registering as a digital press.
Dreamcast used a value of 160. PC used a value of 139.

Property.name: gp_nb
Property.HelpText: Which Gamepad this player will read from.

Property.name: kb_nb
Property.HelpText: Which Keyboard layout this player will read from.

Property.name: lr_on
Property.HelpText:
Analog threshold of L/R on the emulated Dreamcast controller (0~255) for it to start registering as a digital press.
Dreamcast used a value of 192. PC used a value of 140.

Property.name: lr_off
Property.HelpText:
Analog threshold of L/R on the emulated Dreamcast controller (0~255) for it to stop registering as a digital press.
Dreamcast used a value of 160. PC used a value of 139.

Property.name: dz_md
Property.HelpText: Type of analog deadzone to use. 'Circular' will feel smoother and will have more fine control, but 'Square' may feel easier to reproduce the same cardinal movement repeatedly.

Property.name: ls_idz
Property.HelpText: Left analog stick inner-deadzone, as a minimum percentage. A value of '0' will act as no inner-deadzone.

Property.name: rs_idz
Property.HelpText: Right analog stick inner-deadzone, as a minimum percentage. A value of '0' will act as no inner-deadzone.

Property.name: vib_str
Property.HelpText:
Rumble motors strength as a percentage. All vibration values will be multiplied by this value.
A value of 0 will disable rumble for this Gamepad.

Property.name: dz_md
Property.HelpText: Type of analog deadzone to use. 'Circular' will feel smoother and will have more fine control, but 'Square' may feel easier to reproduce the same cardinal movement repeatedly.

Property.name: ls_idz
Property.HelpText: Left analog stick inner-deadzone, as a minimum percentage. A value of '0' will act as no inner-deadzone.

Property.name: rs_idz
Property.HelpText: Right analog stick inner-deadzone, as a minimum percentage. A value of '0' will act as no inner-deadzone.

Property.name: vib_str
Property.HelpText:
Rumble motors strength as a percentage. All vibration values will be multiplied by this value.
A value of 0 will disable rumble for this Gamepad.

Property.name: kb_nb
Property.HelpText: If the mouse input should be used to emulate the right analog stick, and which keyboard layout it should be used for.

Property.name: stick
Property.HelpText: Which analog stick the mouse should emulate.

Property.name: mode
Property.HelpText:
The input method to use to emulate the analog stick.
Mouse Movement: Raw mouse movement is translated to analog input.
Click and Drag: After clicking the specified key/button, mouse position is translated to analog input.

Property.name: click
Property.HelpText: The key/button to "click" in "Click and Drag" analog emulation mode.

Property.name: sensitivity
Property.HelpText: How sensitive the analog emulation should be as a number of cursor points divided by 100.

Property.name: visu_mode
Property.HelpText: Analog Emulation visualizer mode. This helps with visual feedback on your inputs.

Property.name: visu_alpha
Property.HelpText: Visualizer transparancy as a percentage.

Property.name: visu_scale
Property.HelpText: Visualizer scale on-screen. Is independent of game resolution.

Property.name: ls_up
Property.HelpText: Key to map to left stick up, used to move forward.

Property.name: ls_down
Property.HelpText: Key to map to left stick down, used to move backward.

Property.name: ls_left
Property.HelpText: Key to map to left stick left, used to move left.

Property.name: ls_right
Property.HelpText: Key to map to left stick right, used to move right.

Property.name: rs_up
Property.HelpText: Key to map to right stick up, used to move forward.

Property.name: rs_down
Property.HelpText: Key to map to right stick down, used to move backward.

Property.name: rs_left
Property.HelpText: Key to map to right stick left, used to move left.

Property.name: rs_right
Property.HelpText: Key to map to right stick right, used to move right.

Property.name: btn_a
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the A button, used to accept and jump.

Property.name: btn_b
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the B button, used to decline, spindash, and many other actions.

Property.name: btn_x
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the X button, used as a secondary button to decline, spindash, and many other actions.

Property.name: btn_y
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the Y button, used to cycle through different actions which can then be performed with B or X.

Property.name: btn_l
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the L button, used to rotate the camera right.

Property.name: btn_r
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the R button, used to rotate the camera right.

Property.name: btn_start
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the Start button, used to pause.

Property.name: btn_back
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the Back button, unused in the vanilla game but mods may use it.

Property.name: btn_zl
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the left shoulder button, unused in the vanilla game but mods may use it.

Property.name: btn_zr
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the right shoulder button, unused in the vanilla game but mods may use it.

Property.name: btn_ls
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the left analog stick click, unused in the vanilla game but mods may use it.

Property.name: btn_rs
Property.HelpText: Key to map to the right analog stick click, unused in the vanilla game but mods may use it.

Property.name: dp_up
Property.HelpText: Key to map to up on the directional pad, used for moving through menus alongside the left analog stick.

Property.name: dp_down
Property.HelpText: Key to map to down on the directional pad, used for moving through menus alongside the left analog stick.

Property.name: dp_left
Property.HelpText: Key to map to left on the directional pad, used for moving through menus alongside the left analog stick.

Property.name: dp_right
Property.HelpText: Key to map to right on the directional pad, used for moving through menus alongside the left analog stick.

Property.name: ls_up
Property.HelpText: Key to map to left stick up, used to move forward.

Property.name: ls_down
Property.HelpText: Key to map to left stick down, used to move backward.

Property.name: ls_left
Property.HelpText: Key to map to left stick left, used to move left.

Property.name: ls_right
Property.HelpText: Key to map to left stick right, used to move right.

Property.name: rs_up
Property.HelpText: Key to map to right stick up, used to move forward.

Property.name: rs_down
Property.HelpText: Key to map to right stick down, used to move backward.

Property.name: rs_left
Property.HelpText: Key to map to right stick left, used to move left.

Property.name: rs_right
Property.HelpText: Key to map to right stick right, used to move right.

Property.name: btn_rs

Property.name: dp_up
Property.HelpText: Key to map to up on the directional pad, used for moving through menus alongside the left analog stick.

Property.name: dp_down
Property.HelpText: Key to map to down on the directional pad, used for moving through menus alongside the left analog stick.

Property.name: dp_left

Property.name: dp_right
Property.HelpText: Key to map to right on the directional pad, used for moving through menus alongside the left analog stick.

Property.name: dc_drift
Property.HelpText: Restores the Dreamcast stick-drift/deadzone bug. This makes the game quite hard to control accurately, especially when walking. It is not recommended to use this outside of curiosity or nostalgia reasons.

Property.name: gp_axis
Property.HelpText: Print the X, Y, and Magnitude of this gamepad's joysticks to the screen *after* applying deadzone calculations. Useful for honing in Deadzone values.

Property.name: kb_poll
Property.HelpText: Print the index of the last keypress to the screen, easily allowing keys not included in this menu to be manually set.
